body.p: Kentucky teacher and solider. Kentucky native. Married to Cordelia Woodward on October 21, 1854. Father of Luther Woodward, Lissie Woodward, and Walter Woodward. Married to Henrietta J. Payne on December 17, 1863. Teacher in Breckinridge County, Kentucky, in 1860. Captain in the 12th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) from November 17, 1862, to April 7, 1863. Served as provost marshal in Hancock County, Kentucky, in 1864. Commissioned to recruit a company of the State Guard on July 15, 1864.
